Title: Thrift Shop
Description: A 1930s jazz rendition of Macklemore's hit with Robyn Adele Anderson's smooth vocals.

Title: We Can't Stop
Description: A doo-wop style cover of Miley Cyrus' pop anthem, featuring Robyn Adele Anderson.

Title: Creep
Description: A haunting jazz cover of Radiohead's classic, featuring Haley Reinhart's soulful voice.

Title: Habits
Description: A vintage torch song version of Tove Lo's emotional hit, with rich vocal delivery.

Title: Dancing Queen
Description: A swing-style take on ABBA's disco classic, full of retro energy.

Title: All About That Bass
Description: A jazzy, upbeat cover of Meghan Trainor's hit, with a 1940s flair.

Title: Take Me To Church
Description: A gospel-infused jazz cover of Hozier's soulful ballad.

Title: Bad Romance
Description: A reboxed swing version of Lady Gaga's hit, featuring Ariana Savalas.

Title: Heroes
Description: A heartfelt jazz tribute to David Bowie, performed by Nicole Atkins for World Cancer Day.

Title: She Used to be Mine
Description: A poignant, vintage ballad cover of Sara Bareilles' song, with emotional depth.

Title: Oops!... I Did It Again
Description: A jazzy, playful take on Britney Spears' pop hit, with Haley Reinhart.

Title: Mr. Blue Sky
Description: A big band swing cover of ELO's classic, featuring vibrant brass.

Title: Crazy Train
Description: A swing reimagination of Ozzy Osbourne's metal anthem, with Jennie Lena.

Title: Dream On
Description: A dramatic, jazzy cover of Aerosmith's rock ballad, featuring Morgan James.

Title: The Final Countdown
Description: A whirlwind jazz cover of Europe's hair-metal hit, with Gunhild Carling.

Title: I'll Be There for You
Description: A vintage evolution of The Rembrandts' Friends theme, with a nostalgic twist.

Title: What Is Love
Description: A retro cover of Haddaway's dance hit, featuring Xavier Woods on trombone.

Title: Last Friday Night
Description: A lively swing cover of Katy Perry's party anthem, featuring Olivia Kuper Harris.

Title: Blurred Lines
Description: A jazzy reinterpretation of Robin Thicke's hit, part of the 2013 mashup.

Title: Royals
Description: A soulful, vintage cover of Lorde's minimalist pop hit, with Ashley Stroud.
